## i18n

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/i18n/src/index.ts" sourceLine="10" packageName="@commandkit/i18n" />

Returns the i18n plugin and CLI template plugin.
This function initializes the i18n plugin with the provided options and returns both the i18n plugin and the CLI template plugin.

```ts title="Signature"
function i18n(options?: LocalizationPluginOptions): [I18nPlugin, I18nCliTemplatePlugin]
```
Parameters

### options

<MemberInfo kind="parameter" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/i18n/interfaces/localization-plugin-options#localizationpluginoptions'>LocalizationPluginOptions</a>`} />
